resources.string: You are almost ready to start playing, but there are a few things that we must setup first.
External storage isn\'t available. Please make sure that your device is disconnected from a computer and that your SD card is inserted (if applicable) and restart the app.
The setup wizard will run again when you next launch the game.
Advanced users can play around with these, but they\'re best kept to defaults.
The game is much better with audio, but may cause the game to run slower on less powerful devices.
Native resolution may look better, but the UI could be too small to use if you have a screen with a large DPI. If in doubt, choose default.
You should place the original Theme Hospital files on your external storage in a directory called \'th\', or choose an alternative below.
Preparing Game environment, please wait a moment...
This will download and install the Theme Hospital lite version(36MB), which includes audio and all the levels, but only English announcer.
There was a problem downloading the game files
CorsixTH supports multiple languages. Please choose from the supported languages below.
Error downloading file. Music will not be available. Please try again."
Music requires an additional download. Download file (14MB)?
You need an internet connection to download. Please connect to a network and try again.
Can\'t find the original game files, place them on your external storage or download lite version.
Sorry, this game requires at least 800x480 resolution in order to run, your device can not run this game.
Has been found game data, use it directly.
Please specify a game files extraction path, default will extract to "th" directory of external storage, or choose an alternative below.
Extracting Game Files. This will only occur once, but may take a while.
File extract failed, this may be the extraction path is incorrect or not enough space(\>50MB) of external storage!
Preparing environment failed. Please make sure external storage have enough space and try again.
